Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: I have IBS and it definitely works with me eating disorder. I've really struggled with the pain it caused, which leads to me fearing foods for a number of reasons and having some bizarre fear foods as a result of IBS flares.

Author: notracisthasblackcat
Text: No but I have a lot of gut problems which means I have a whole bunch of random trigger foods similar to IBS that I have to avoid. It makes eating hard because if I eat something wrong my body will put on weight and I don't know if it's fluid or fat but it doesn't come off unless I restrict. It's a constant daily struggle and it basically fuels my ED.
